name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Django**, and **NestJS**, as well as developing robust backend solutions using **Express** and **PostgreSQL**. Adept in creating scalable architectures leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD pipelines for efficient delivery and deployment.

Experienced with RESTful APIs and real-time data processing, ensuring comprehensive testing through **Jest**, **Jasmine**, **Pytest**, and continuous integration methodologies. Demonstrated skills in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, as well as a firm understanding of compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in contributing to open-source projects, enhancing collaborative and innovative project development.
